document.full_text: mcdonald's corp  posted a better-than-expected 6 percent global rise in april sales at established restaurants as higher menu prices helped offset rising costs for beef and other ingredients.
document.title: higher prices boost mcdonald's april sales
lines_and_colors: mcdonald's corp  posted a better-than-expected 6 percent global rise in april sales at established restaurants as higher menu prices helped offset rising costs for beef and other ingredients.
